content:
balance as at 30 September 2022 mainly represented the net book value of the Targeted properties of CNY110.7M. The original value did not change over the period, the book value change represented the depreciation of properties.

Project Ningbo Wanchen was an investment property that 房屋建築物 and 土地使用權 previously acquired from unspecified owner. The land was located in unspecified location (unspecified size sqm), the construction of Project Ningbo Wanchen was completed in unspecified date and was unspecified leasing status over the period. The land and warehouses were depreciated using straight-line method of 50 years and 20 years of useful life, with the residual value rate of 0% and 4%, respectively.

As at this report date, Project Ningbo Wanchen did not conduct final accounts. Though management said that most of the primary contracts had been verified and accounted, the original costs may still not be finalised. Potential under-estimated construction payables and CAPEX commitment may still exist, you should confirm with management if there are any future CAPEX plans and factor the capital commitments (if any) into your valuation model.

Total properties of Project Ningbo Wanchen were mortgaged as loan collateral in favour of unspecified bank.

SUMMARY: Used entities '房屋建築物' (CNY95.5M carrying amount) and '土地使用權' (CNY15.2M carrying amount) with total investment property value of CNY110.7M as at 30-Sep-2022.
